title: Review: server implementation
description: Review server-fixer branch for quality, correctness, and acceptance criteria
close_reason: Review PASS: 14/14 tests, typecheck clean. Two medium observations noted.

close_reason: Initial server implementation - superseded by server-fixer

title: Review: Fixed client visualization
description: Review fix-builder output for re-flight bug fix
close_reason: Review PASS: fix-builder re-flight fix verified correct.

title: Server: WebSocket server + shared protocol types
description: Build the Bun WebSocket server that reads Overstory SQLite DBs and pushes real-time state to connected browsers. Includes shared TypeScript protocol types in shared/types.ts. File area: server/, shared/. Data sources: sessions.db (agents, runs), mail.db (messages), merge-queue.db (merges), events.db (tool activity), metrics.db (cost tracking). Server polls DBs, diffs state, pushes snapshots via WebSocket. Also serves the client HTML.
close_reason: Server work stream complete. WebSocket server + shared protocol types delivered on overstory/server-fixer/swarm-viz-ohx. Review PASS. Merge ready.

title: Revise: Align types with coordinator spec and add missing features
description: Fix shared/types.ts, scene.ts colors/sizing, add merge flow viz
close_reason: Revised client viz aligned with coordinator spec. Review FAILed on re-flight bug â€” fixed in swarm-viz-x1v.

title: Build: Core scaffolding (types, scene, websocket, entry)
description: Create shared/types.ts, client/index.html, client/main.ts, client/scene.ts, client/websocket.ts
close_reason: Core scaffolding completed. Output superseded by revise-builder (swarm-viz-9w0) which aligned types with coordinator spec.

title: Review: Revised client visualization
description: Review revise-builder output on branch overstory/revise-builder/swarm-viz-9w0
close_reason: Review FAIL: found re-flight bug in revise-builder output. Bug fixed by fix-builder.

title: Integration: reconcile server and client type systems
description: Merge client visualization files from revise-builder and fix-builder branches into main. Reconcile shared/types.ts between server (detailed DB types) and client (simplified viz types). Fix type:'delta' vs type:'update' mismatch. Ensure both server and client compile.

title: Revise: add missing types, DBs, static serving
description: Revision of server-builder work to add missing protocol types, events.db/metrics.db, static file serving, and graceful DB handling

title: Fix: port 3000, client/index.html, missing types
close_reason: Final implementation with all fixes: port 3000, client/index.html, bun-types. Review PASS.

title: Client: Three.js WebGL visualization
description: Build the full-screen Three.js WebGL visualization that connects to the WebSocket server and renders the Overstory swarm. File area: client/. Features: force-directed graph of agent nodes as glowing orbs, message particle trails between agents, merge queue flow visualization, agent lifecycle animations (spawn bloom, fade on completion), dark theme with neon accents, bloom/glow post-processing. Target 60fps. Consumes shared protocol types from shared/types.ts.
close_reason: Client Three.js WebGL visualization complete. 5 source files across shared/ and client/. Force-directed graph with glowing orbs, message particle arcs, merge queue diamonds, bloom post-processing. Types aligned with coordinator spec. Re-flight bug caught in review and fixed. Merge order: revise-builder then fix-builder.

title: Integrate server and client type systems with viz protocol layer
Build: Visualization components (nodes, edges, layout)
close_reason: Viz components completed but superseded. Core-builder produced monolithic scene.ts covering same functionality. Revise-builder (swarm-viz-9w0) is the final output.

title: Fix: Message re-flight bug + add quality gate scripts
description: Fix re-flight loop in scene.ts and add typecheck/lint scripts to package.json
close_reason: Fixed message re-flight bug (flownMessages Set). Added typecheck/lint scripts. Review PASS.
